error.country: Please enter the two character country code.
error.email: Please enter a valid email address.
error.email_match: The email addresses do not match.
error.password_format: Your password must be at least 6 characters long
error.telephone: Please enter a valid phone number.
error.telephone_match: The phone number does not match.
info.saved: Success! Your new account information has been saved.
info.title: Personal Information
name: Name
two_factor.authy.title: Two-Factor Authentication with Authy
two_factor.backup_code: Your second-factor backup code is **%{backup}**. This can be used for manual setup, and is necessary to recover your account in case your mobile phone is lost or stolen.
two_factor.card.description: Protect your account by setting up second factor authentication. You can choose from Google Authenticator, Authy, or your preferred Time-based One Time Password (TOTP) app.
two_factor.description: Enable two-factor authentication with Google Auth, Authy, or TOTP.
two_factor.dialog.description: The first step is to [install the Authy app](https://www.authy.com/download). Once it is installed, click Next.
two_factor.dialog.google-auth.descriptio: After installing the Google Authenticator app scan the QR code below and enter the verification code you see in the Google Authenticator app
two_factor.dialog.google-auth.title: Set Up Two-Factor with Google Auth
two_factor.dialog.title: Enable Two-Factor Authentication
two_factor.dialog.totp.description: You can use any of your favorite TOTP providers such as 1Password, Google Authenticator, or Duo Mobile. To set up TOTP, scan the QR code below and enter the verification code you see in your TOTP app.
two_factor.dialog.totp.title: Set Up Two-Factor with TOTP
two_factor.disable.description: Enter your second-factor verification code to disable.
two_factor.disable.title: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
two_factor.disabledescription: If you would like to change second-factor authentication providers to Google Authenticator, TOTP, or Authy then disable two-factor and re-configure your second-factor.
two_factor.enter_verification: After scanning the QR Code, enter the verification code.
two_factor.google-auth.description: Two-factor authentication with the Google Authenticator app.
two_factor.google-auth.title: Two-Factor Authentication with Google Authenticator
two_factor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
two_factor.totp.description: Two-factor authentication with with your preferred TOTP (Time-Based One-Time Password) provider.
two_factor.totp.title: Two-Factor Authentication with TOTP
